website_summaries.verdict: This bottle of 100 vegetarian chromium capsules is a valuable mineral supplement for a great price.
pros: Trusted quality from a renowned and respected health supplement brand
Affordable with no compromise on quality or efficacy
Free of gluten, soy, nuts, and other allergens
cons: Rare complaints that it is less potent than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Helping with fasting numbers?
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for about 1 week now, 1 at breakfast and 1 at dinner. I don't know if it is possible but all of a sudden my fasting has went down 15-25 points a day for 3 days in a row. It is now around where I need it to be. This is the only thing I have done differently so I think it must have been this supplement and drinking BCAA in the morning after testing my blood sugar. I am thinking it is this supplement,
customer_reviews.author: LorenaW

customer_reviews.title: Didn't find it as effective as my previous Chromium brand
customer_reviews.text: I was using Whole Foods store brand Chromium Picolinate until now. This was cheaper and I generally trust NOW brand so I decided to give this one a go. For some reason, this one wasn't as effective in keeping my falling blood sugar at bay, even though it's the same type of chromium and same dosage. I'm guessing it just has less potency. I'm disappointed because the price was so much better. I'll finish the bottle, but will likely look for another brand's Chromium after this. I do want to add that I have been happy with other NOW products but unfortunately this one didn't make the cut.
customer_reviews.author: ShareTheLove

customer_reviews.title: for me it is fantastic. When taking this supplement
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about my blood sugar level, as I haven't had it tested recently and has never been abnormal or a concern. However, as a dietary/workout aid, for me it is fantastic. When taking this supplement, within days I notice I am leaner and when I forget to take it or take a "break", I become pudgier! It definitely makes a difference. I'm 52 years old, 5'6", a size 6 and usually lift weights, nothing crazy, around 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, but unfortunately the list of ingredients was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but unfortunately the list of ingredients was posted incomplete- it only lists rice and gelatin(capsule). It omitted the fact it contains cellulose, which for those who are allergic is a very important bit of info.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chromium smelled RANCID, even though expiration date is still good
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in many, many years, a NOW brand supplement smelled RANCID. The only thing I can figure out is that the gelatin capsules are rancid. The expiration date on the bottle is still good. When I opened the bottle the first time, it smelled funky. Not being one to give up, the 2nd day, I thought I'd try again. That time, the rancid smell was so bad it almost made me vomit. Can't believe this happened with a NOW brand product. They have always been an excellent company, in my past experience. Unfortunately, this chromium is past Amazon's return date.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2018

customer_reviews.title: Natural energy in a pill.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes me feel human again. My energy levels are up and I am able to get things done. Buy it! Take it for at least three days in order for it to fully kick in and enjoy a rebirth. You will feel good again like you have become young.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: I take this daily.
customer_reviews.text: I take this daily to help regulate my sugar. Works great with the help of Dr's prescriptions. Helps keep my A1C in control.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Helps to regulate my blood sugar
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years at the recommendation of a naturopath. I have a family history of diabetic and so far never developed this condition. I give credit to this pill and a sensible diet
customer_reviews.author: Jessy M.

customer_reviews.title: So important for blood sugar
customer_reviews.text: You may not feel what this is doing until you have bloodwork done, but it is fantastic to controlling blood sugar, esp. for diabetics.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia28

customer_reviews.title: Well, I've lost weight by eating smaller portions more ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've lost weight by eating smaller portions more frequently and taking this supplement. I lost weight initially WITHOUT the chromium, because frequent small but healthy snacks increase metabolism, as does chromium. Did the chromium help??? Maybe, quien sabe?
customer_reviews.author: pjb448

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Now products anyway but this one has really helped with my weight loss
customer_reviews.author: imfaithdriven

customer_reviews.title: My last two orders were rancid
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. They smell and taste rancid, all of the bottles. I returned the last order today.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Linden

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the product being packaged, and delivered when promised. I would definitely recommend this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: LCHF/Keto supplement.
customer_reviews.text: I think these work well. Worth the peace of mind when I overindulge or when I'm getting back into ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Dosage
customer_reviews.text: Just the right dosage. I also prefer the capsules, which seem to dissolve more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninghouse

customer_reviews.title: After six months, no noticeable difference...  after six months, no noticeable difference...
customer_reviews.text: Been taking it for about six months... No noticeable difference in metabolism or fat burning enhancement
customer_reviews.author: Stewardship

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open and labelling is plain (in a good way).
customer_reviews.author: Misty Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell if I'm benefitting from this supplement. I'm trusting that it is improving my health.
customer_reviews.author: A.A.Norman Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: NOW makes top notch products
customer_reviews.text: capusles a little large vs others, but NOW makes top notch products so...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bob Walton

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking for a few days and definitely recognize a decrease in my appetite. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for dealing with my love for sweet and ice cream. I would say - It works great. I did't expect results so soon - but my appetite is't crazy anymore. Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: OlgaW

customer_reviews.title: Like it to help control my sugar intake.
customer_reviews.text: Always like taking this to help my sugar levels from spiking.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you away from treats
customer_reviews.text: Took my cravings away. I usually eat everything my eyes see, even more when I am stress. My brother recommended them and I was magical. I haven’t touch the halloween pumpkins so far, which is a lot. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Effects
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot fewer of these than a previously used brand, and my blood sugar stays stable. I can eat less over all and maintain my blood sugar levels.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Summers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before. I can't give advice on this, but the packaging was appropriate and the product is what it is. I'll keep purchasing this product as needed.
customer_reviews.author: trid2bnrml

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure that I notice any difference to be honest, but my doc wanted me to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, I use it to help stabalize my blood sugar levels. (hypoglycemia)
customer_reviews.author: W. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: May help to shine.
customer_reviews.text: One a day, no more, seems to work to keep the metabolism humming with proper vitamin and diet. Just not sure I love it for five stars.
customer_reviews.author: FixaLot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Now is one of my go to brands for vitamins and herbs.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my cheek acne
customer_reviews.text: I don't break out anymore on my cheeks thanks to this. But I only started seeing results after taking 800mcg a day. So for some people, 200mcg might be too little.
customer_reviews.author: ImWhereImAt

customer_reviews.title: Now products are reputable
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume this helps me get the suppliment my body needs. Now has a good reputation and it is a capsule that is easy to take. It does not require refrigeration. Great price. One should be tested to see if they are deficient or need it before investing in suppliments. I recommend this Now product if you need chromium, would buy again, and I hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: A Long-time Prime Person

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: For me this works better than cinnamon to keep my blood sugar level, I take it in the morning and in the evening, I think it also knocks the edge off wanting to snack at night on things like chocolate, cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Girl

customer_reviews.title: I have noticed that when I've missed taking it that I have cravings for sweets and bad carbs. I only rated it 4 stars because ..
customer_reviews.text: It works for me! I I have been taking it for about a month now. I have noticed that when I've missed taking it that I have cravings for sweets and bad carbs. I only rated it 4 stars because I have missed taking it a few days here or there, but I'm definitely satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chillous

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great! It arrived when it was expected to and it was exactly what i was expecting it to be. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: The Big Slong

customer_reviews.title: Works fine- not a miracle though
customer_reviews.text: Good, seems to do what it says. I don't know if I'm losgin weight but I've had no bad side effects, no aftertaste. It arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Texas mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Greatly reduces fasting glucose level. No negative side effects for me but try it for yourself. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: works, but I'd prefer a small gelcap
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good price for chromium picolinate, but I really would prefer a smaller gelcap that would be easier to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa (.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow capsules that do what they say. They are helping to curb my sweet tooth which was getting out of hand.
customer_reviews.author: C. N. Walters-Burke

customer_reviews.title: I like that their small and easy to take also the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that their small and easy to take also the price is Right! Though I can't say I feel any better or worse from taking this product I feel I will be doing well 'long term' by taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to support your craving for chocolate. Did'nt touch it. Gonna try magnesium instead. Product was exactly what they said it was however.
customer_reviews.author: Riggszoo

product_meta.title: NOW Supplements, Chromium Picolinate 200 mcg, 100 Veg Capsules
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Chromium is an essential trace mineral that is best known for its role as an insulin co-factor.* Chromium is therefore critical for the maintenance of healthy glucose and carbohydrate metabolism; however, it is also important for the utilization of fat and protein.* Scientific studies also indicate that it may play a role in cardiovascular health.* As part of a healthy diet and exercise program, Chromium Picolinate may help to maintain healthy blood sugar levels already within the normal range and may also help to support a healthy body composition.* Natural color variation may occur in this product.
feature_bullets: INSULIN CO-FACTOR*/200 mcg VEGAN CAPSULES: Chromium is an essential trace mineral that is best known for its role as an insulin co-factor.*

SUPPORTS HEALTHY GLUCOSE METABOLISM*: Chromium is therefore critical for the maintenance of healthy glucose and carbohydrate metabolism; however, it is also important for the utilization of fat and protein.*
CERTIFICATIONS/CLASSIFICATIONS: Made without Gluten, Dairy Free, Egg Free, Non-GMO, Halal, Nut Free, Soy Free, Corn Free

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968
